title: is the league competitive coming back?
body:
Hello , i had a lot of questions about competitive mode..  can someone explain it more for me, what's it's future and how will it be if Riot actually talked about it? and is it actually coming back anytime soon? thank you. 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: It should be coming back, it was just being tested for a short beta is all ^_^! Check out our [**Clash Sticky**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/K473aB1c-clash-beta-issues) for the discord link and where you can find all the info!
